name: Skylantis - The Video Game (Canceled)
blurb: Skylantis features an adventurous mix of platforming, action, and role-playing gameplay presented in the third-person perspective.

rewards.reward: Your dollar whether crumpled, torn, or folded at the edges, will gladly be accepted. Also you may be the one who ultimately changes the outcome of our Kickstarter special ability. Thank you for joining the party and spreading the word to bring the wonderful and wacky world of Skylantis to Life!

Digital copy of the Skylantis GAME Plus 3 SONGS from the Soundtrack. Every great journey has a beginning and this is your chance to discover the hidden path leading to Skylantis. Will you be the first to uncover all of the mysteries or conquer every difficulty? Either way we know you will enjoy the fun and exciting surprises waiting to be revealed.

Digital copy of the FULL Skylantis SOUNDTRACK and Digital COPY of the GAME. Need a boost at the gym or a fun melody to PLAY on your next date? Take all of the music you have grown to love with you on life's adventures.

Digital download of the Skylantis ART BOOK and Soundtrack plus TWO digital COPIES of the GAME so you can gift one to a fellow adventurer. You will also both be sent an invitation to PARTICIPATE in ALPHA gameplay. Additionally we are going to return the favor and help Kickstart your adventure in the game by granting a SPECIAL KICK ABILITY. This will be used for obtaining bonus cogs.

LIMITED EDITION Skylantis Backer T-SHIRT. Bring Gizmo the little robot with a huge sense of adventure with you wherever you go. Digital download of the Skylantis Art Book and Soundtrack with THREE digital COPIES of the Skylantis GAME. You and two others will have early ACCESS to the ALPHA. (Please add $10 for international shipping)

LIMITED EDITION BOX SET of the Game and T-SHIRT. Includes the Skylantis Soundtrack and FOUR additional digital COPIES of the GAME. Be the hero of the day for three lucky friends. All four of you will have early ACCESS to the ALPHA where you can get the head start on exploring the entry levels of Skylantis. Also be one of the few to receive the Limited PRINT COPY of the ART BOOK and Skylantis POSTER, SIGNED by our team, along with ACCESS to the DEVELOPERS BLOG where you can help create the world of Skylantis. See where it all started and provide your assistance as we complete this exciting journey.

Have you always felt like your NAME should be immortalized on a BUILDING or BRANDED on the back of a destructive ROBOT? Send your bio and we will find one of our robots that closely matches your personality. You may even be CHOSEN to have your name ENGRAVED on a Library, Castle, Observatory, Clock Tower, or the Skylantis Factory. While seeking for your iconic name in the game will be a quest, you will easily find it in the credits under the FOUNDERS of Skylantis section.You will also receive the LIMITED EDITION BOX SET of the Game and T-SHIRT. FOUR digital copies of the game. ACCESS to the ALPHA, Signed POSTER and ACCESS to the DEVELOPERS BLOG.

ROBOTIC VERSION of you DRAWN by our Team. Send in a picture of yourself in a fun, serious, or seriously WACKY POSE and our team will CREATE a robotic version of you. Soon after the game is completed you will receive a LARGE POSTER that can be proudly draped in your home. You will also receive the LIMITED EDITION BOX SET of the Game and T-SHIRT. FOUR digital copies of the game. ACCESS to the ALPHA, Signed POSTER and ACCESS to the DEVELOPERS BLOG.

DESIGN your very own sixty second BONUS STAGE. We provide the assets and you direct the assembly. Make it easy, FUN or outright ridiculous. Select from a variety of islands, treadmills, spikes, EXPLODING BOTS, and much much more! After creating your level we will send it to you for testing to make sure it meets your VISION. You will be listed as a game designer in our credits, and have a ROBOTIC VERSION of you DRAWN by our Team. (see previous reward for details). You will also receive the LIMITED EDITION BOX SET of the Game and T-SHIRT. FOUR digital copies of the game. ACCESS to the ALPHA, Signed POSTER and ACCESS to the DEVELOPERS BLOG.
